429:1: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt-ayuktametanmama syādakṛtajñatā ca yadahamaprativedya mahārājñaḥ śuddhodanasya ananujñātaśca pitrā niṣkrameyam|

429:34: amitāyuṣaśca bhavi no ca bhaveta mṛtyuḥ
429:37: asthānu yācasi kumāra na me'tra śaktiḥ|
429:40: yadidāni deva caturo vara no dadāsi

429:58: evaṃ dakṣiṇe paścime uttare nagaradvāre pañca pañca śākyakumāraśatāni kṛtāstrāṇi kṛtayogyāni iṣvastraśikṣitāni mahānagnabalopetāni|
429:60: ekaikaṃ ca rathaṃ pañcapattiśataparivāraṃ sthāpitamabhūta bodhisattvasya rakṣārtham|

429:66: saṃgīti yojayethā jāgaratha atandritā imāṃ rajanīm|

429:70: dvārāṃ pithetha sarvāṃ suyantritāṃ nirgaḍāṃ dṛḍhakapāṭāṃ|

429:101: tatra yuṣmābhiḥ sarvaiḥ pūjākarmaṇe autsukyena bhavitavyam ||
429:102: tatra śāntamatirnāma devaputraḥ sa evamāha-ahaṃ tāvatkapilavastuni mahānagare sarvastrīpuruṣadārakadārikāṇāṃ prasvāpanaṃ kariṣyāmi|

429:112: tatra varuṇaśca nāma nāgarājo manasvī ca nāgarājaḥ sāgaraśca nāgarājo'navataptaśca nāgarājo nandopanandau nāgarājāvevamāhuḥ-vayamapi bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe kālānusārimeghamabhinirmāya uragasāracandanacūrṇavarṣamabhivarṣayiṣyāmaḥ||

429:368: tadā amara nabhagatāḥ kilakilā muñciṣu kusumavṛṣṭiḥ|
429:369: jaya he paramamatidharā jagati abhayadāyakā nātha||59||
429:374: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasya niścayaṃ viditvā śāntamatiśca devaputro lalitavyūhaśca devaputraḥ kapilavastuni mahānagare sarvastrīpuruṣadārakadārikānāmapasvāpanamakurutām,
429:376: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ sarvaṃ nagarajanaṃ prasuptaṃ viditvā ardharātrisamayaṃ copasthitaṃ jñātvā puṣyaṃ ca nakṣatrādhipatiṃ yuktaṃ jñātvā sāṃprataṃ niṣkramaṇakāla iti jñātvā chandakamāmantrayate sma— chandaka māṃ medānīṃ khedaya|
429:380: atha tatkṣaṇameva catvāro lokapālā bodhisattvasya vacanamupaśrutya svakasvakāni ca bhavanāni gatvā bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe svaiḥ svairvyūhaistvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ punarapi kapilavastumahānagaramāgacchanti sma||
429:381: tatra dhṛtarāṣṭro mahārājo gandharvādhipatiḥ pūrvasyā diśa āgato'bhūt sārdhamanekairgandharvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrairnānātūryasaṃgītisaṃpravāditena|
429:382: āgatya ca kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yathāgataḥ pūrvāṃ diśamupaniśrityāsthāt bodhisattvaṃ namasyamānaḥ||
429:385: āgatya ca kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yathāgata eva dakṣiṇāṃ diśamupaniśrityāsthāt bodhisattvaṃ namasyamānaḥ||
429:386: paścimāyā diśo virūpākṣo mahārāja āgato'bhūt sārdhamanekairnāgakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrairnānāmuktāhārapāṇipralambitairnānāmaṇiratnaparigṛhītairgandha-cūrṇapuṣpavarṣameghasamutthitaiśca mṛdubhiḥ sugandhibhirnānāvātaiḥ pravāyadbhiḥ|
429:387: āgatya ca kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yathāgata eva paścimāṃ diśamupaniśrityāsthāt bodhisattvaṃ namasyamānaḥ||
429:389: āgatya kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yathāgata evottarāṃ diśamupaniśrityāsthāt bodhisattvaṃ namasyamānaḥ||
429:391: āgatya kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yathāgata eva saparivāra uparyantarikṣe'sthāt bodhisattvaṃ namaskurvan ||
429:392: iti hi bhikṣavaśchandako bodhisattvasya vacanamupaśrutyāśrupūrṇanayano bodhisattvamevamāha-āryaputra tvaṃ ca kālajño velajñaśca samayajñaḥ|
429:445: nagare istrika dārakāśca puruṣā yāścābhavan dārikāḥ
429:448: sarve te śayitā kilāntamanasaḥ paśyanti rūpaṃ na te||71||
429:449: ye cā te dṛḍhavajratomaradharā śākyaiḥ sutāḥ sthāpitāḥ
429:451: rājā rājakumāra pārthivajanaḥ sarve prasuptā bhavan
429:452: api cā nārigaṇā vinagnavasanā suptā na te buddhiṣū||72||
429:454: rātrau nirgata ardharātrasamaye taṃ chandakaṃ abravīt|
429:455: sādhū chandaka dehi kaṇṭhaku mama svālaṃkṛtaṃ śobhanaṃ
429:456: mā vighnaṃ kuru me dadāhi capalaṃ yadi me priyaṃ manyase||73||
429:457: kva tvaṃ yāsyasi sattvasārathivarā kiṃ aśvakāryaṃ ca te
429:458: kālajñaḥ samayajña dharmacaraṇo kālo na gantu kvacit|
429:459: dvārāste pithitā dṛḍhārgalakṛtā ko dāsyate tāṃ tava|
429:460: śakreṇā manasātha cetanavaśātte dvāra muktā kṛtāḥ
429:461: dṛṣṭvā chandaka harṣito puna dukhī aśrūṇi so'vartayī|
429:462: hā dhikko mi sahāyu kiṃ tu kurumī dhāvāmi kāṃ vā diśaṃ
429:463: ugraṃtejadhareṇa vākyu bhaṇitaṃ śakyaṃ na saṃdhāritum||74||
429:464: sā senā caturaṅginī balavatī kiṃ bhū karotīha hā
429:465: rājā rājakumāra pārthiva jano nemaṃ hi budhyanti te|
429:469: sādhu chandaka dehi kaṇṭhakavaraṃ mā khedayī nāyakam|
429:472: paśya chandaka antarīkṣa vimalaṃ divyā prabhā śobhate
429:474: śakraṃ paśya śacīpatiṃ balavṛtaṃ dvārasthitaṃ bhrājate
429:476: śrutvā chandaka devatāna vacanaṃ taṃ kaṇṭhakaṃ ālapī
429:478: so taṃ varṣikuvarṇa kāñcanakhuraṃ svālaṃkṛtaṃ kṛtvanā
429:480: eṣā te varalakṣaṇā hitakarā aśvaḥ sujātaḥ śubho
429:481: gaccha sidhyatu tubhya eva praṇidhiryaścintitaḥ pūrvaśaḥ|
429:482: ye te vighnakarā vrajantu praśamaṃ āsāṃ vrataṃ sidhyatāṃ
429:484: sarvā kampita ṣaḍvikāra dharaṇī śayanādyadā sotthitaḥ
429:487: śakro brahma ubhau ca tasya purato darśyanti mārgo hyayam||80||
429:488: ābhā tena pramukta acchavimalā obhāsitā medinī
429:489: sarve śānta apāya sattva sukhitā kleśairna bādhyī tadā|
429:491: sarve kṛtva pradakṣiṇaṃ puravaraṃ gacchanti harṣānvitāḥ||81||
429:506: ghrāyiṣyi gandha na ca divya punaḥ
429:534: eṣa maha dakṣiṇīyo eṣa maha puṇyakṣetraṃ
429:539: na ca kāma naiva bhogāṃ prārthentu śīlarakṣī||93||
429:541: na ca krodhu naiva roṣaḥ sattvaparitrāyaṇārtham|
429:565: ena jitu kleśamāro ena jitu skandhamāro
429:570: bhuvi divi ca saṃpraghuṣṭo jinu bheṣyate svayaṃbhūḥ|
429:572: yatpuṇya tvāṃ stavitvā bhoma yatha vādisiṃhaḥ||101||
429:573: iti hi bhikṣavo'bhiniṣkrānto bodhisattvo'tikramya śākyānatikramya kroḍyānatikramya mallān maineyānāmanuvaineye niga me ṣaṭsu yojaneṣu|
429:575: tato bodhisattvo kaṇṭhakādavatīrya dharaṇītale sthitvā taṃ mahāntaṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragasaṃghaṃ visarjayati sma|
429:576: visarjya cāsyaitadabhūt—imānyābharaṇāni kaṇṭhakaṃ ca chandakasya haste visarjayāmīti||
429:579: yatra ca pradeśe chandako nivṛttastatra caityaṃ sthāpitamabhūt|
429:581: punaśca bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat-kathaṃ ca nāma cūḍā ca pravrajyā ceti|
429:582: sa khaḍgena cūḍāṃ chittvā antarikṣe kṣipati sma|
429:583: sā ca trāyatriṃśatā devaiḥ parigṛhītābhūt pūjārtham|
429:584: adyāpi ca trāyatriṃśatsu deveṣu cūḍāmaho vartate|
429:587: punarapi bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt-kathaṃ hi nāma pravrajyā ca kāśikāni vastrāṇi|
429:591: tatraiko devaputro divyaṃ rūpamantardhāpya lubdhakarūpeṇa kāṣāyavastraprāvṛto bodhisattvasya purato'sthāt|
429:592: atha bodhisattvastametadavocat-sacenme tvaṃ mārṣā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dadyāḥ,
429:597: tatastena lubdhakarūpiṇā devaputreṇa bodhisattvāya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dattānyabhūvan|
429:599: atha sa devaputro gauravajātastāni vastrāṇi ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ śirasi kṛtvā tata eva devalokamagamat teṣāṃ pūjārtham|
429:603: yadā ca bodhisattvena cūḍāṃ chittvā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi prāvṛtāni,
429:604: tasmin samaye devaputraśatasahasrā hṛṣṭāstuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ paramapramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā hīhīkārakilikilāprakṣveḍitānirnādanirghoṣaśabdamakārṣuḥ|
429:608: yāvajjarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ parimocya saṃsārasāgarāt pāramuttāryānuttare kṣeme'bhaye'śoke nirūpadrave śive virajase'mṛte dharmadhātau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyatīti|
429:610: tato'ntaḥpurikābhiḥ kumāramapaśyantībhiḥ grīṣmikavārṣikahaimantikeṣu prāsādeṣvāsaneṣu ca gṛheṣu parimāgamāṇā yadā na paśyanti sma,
429:612: tatra kāścitstriyaḥ paramaśokārtā hā tātehi krandanti sma|
429:631: kāścinmṛgya iva digdhaviddhāḥ sahasā pradhāvantyo rudanti sma|
429:632: kāścinmārutakampitā iva kadalyaḥ pravikampyamānā rudanti sma|
429:634: kāścijjālotkṣiptamatsyā iva pṛthivyāṃ parivartyamānā rudanti sma|
429:635: kāścinmūlachinnā iva vṛkṣāḥ sahasā dharaṇītale nipatya rudanti sma||
429:636: taṃ ca śabdaṃ rājā śrutvā śākyānāmantrayate sma-kimetaduccairantaḥpure śabdaḥ śrūyate?
429:637: śākyā vijñāya kathayanti sma-kumāraḥ kila mahārāja antaḥpure na dṛśyate|
429:642: mahāprajāpatyapi gautamī paridevamānā mahītale parivartate sma|
429:643: rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāha kṣipraṃ māṃ mahārāja putreṇa samaṅginīṃ kuruṣveti||
429:648: te maṅgaladvāreṇa gacchantaḥ paśyanti sma antarāpathi puṣpavarṣaṃ prapatitam|
429:650: te svalpamantaraṃ gatvā taṃ devaputraṃ paśyanti sma bodhisattvasya kāśikavastrāṇi śirasi kṛtvā āgacchantam|
429:652: mā khalvanenaiṣāṃ vastrāṇāmarthe kumāro jīvitādvyaparopitaḥ syāt|
429:656: tataste parasparamūcuḥ-mā tāvadbhoḥ sāhasaṃ mā kārṣṭa|
429:660: mā khalvanenaiva puruṣeṇa kāśikānāṃ vastrāṇāmarthāya kumāro jīvitādvyaparopitaḥ syāt|
429:662: api tu anena kumārāya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dattāni|
429:664: atha sa devaputrastāni vastrāṇyubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ śirasi kṛtvā tata eva devalokamagamat teṣāṃ pūjārtham||
429:665: evaṃ ca te bhūyaśchandakaṃ paripṛcchanti sma-tatkiṃ manyase chandaka gacchāmo vayam?
429:669: evaṃ ca tenoktam-na tāvadahaṃ punarapi kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pravekṣyāmi,
429:674: tatastānyābharaṇāni cireṇa kālena bhadrikasya śākyakumārasya mahānāmno'niruddhasya cābadhyanta sma|
429:675: tāni mahānārāyaṇasaṃghaṭanakāyārthamanye nārāyaṇasaṃhananā na śaknuvanti sma dhārayitum|
429:676: yadā na kaścittāni dhārayituṃ śaknoti sma,
429:680: tato mahāprajāpatī gautamī tānyābharaṇāni puṣkariṇyāṃ prakṣipati sma|
429:688: śayanaṃ nirīkṣī na ca dṛśi bodhisattvam|
429:690: hā vañcitāḥ smaḥ kahi gatu bodhisattvo||103||
429:702: kva tvaṃ gato'si mama śayi chorayitvā||106||
429:703: na pāsyi pānaṃ na ca madhu na pramādaṃ
429:709: veśmaṃ na śobhī aṭavi puraṃ prakāśaṃ
429:724: gataḥ kumāro na ca puna śocayethā|
429:744: no cāpi harṣī na ca gira śraddadhāti|
429:747: dṛṣṭvā tu rājā hayavaru chandakaṃ ca
429:752: kiṃ vā prayogaḥ kva ca gatu bodhisattvaḥ|
429:754: pūjā ca tasyā katha kṛta devasaṃghaiḥ||119||
429:760: suptā prasuptā na ca gira te śruṇanti|
429:773: dṛṣṭvā tu gopā hayavaru chandakaṃ ca
429:783: hā mahya prītijananā hā mama narapuṃgavā vimalacandramukhā|
429:784: hā mama surūparūpā hā mama varalakṣaṇā vimalatejadharā||127||
429:785: hā mama aninditāṅgā sujāta anupūrvaudgatā asamā|
429:786: hā mama guṇāgradhāriṃ naramarūbhiḥ pūjitā paramakārūṇikā||128||
429:791: hā mama sujātajātā lumbinivana uttame bhramaragītarute|
429:792: hā mama vighuṣṭaśabdā divi bhuvi abhipūjitā vipulajñānadrumā||131||
429:793: hā mama rasārasāgrā bimboṣṭhā kamalalocanā kanakanibhā|
429:795: hā mama sunāsa subhrū ūrṇābhru mukhāntare sthitā vimalā|
429:798: iti tasya bhūṣaṇāni puṇyehi kṛtāni pārthive prītikarā||134||
429:801: hā kaṇṭhakā sujātā mama bhartu sahāyakastvayā kva nīto|
429:802: hā chandakā nikaruṇā na bodhayasi gacchamānake naravariṣṭhe||136||
429:803: gacchatyayaṃ hitakaro ekā gira tasminnantari na bhasi kasmāt|
429:804: itu adya puravarāto gacchati naradamyasārathiḥ kāruṇikaḥ||137||
429:805: katha vā gato hitakaro kena ca niṣkramito itu sa rājakulāt|
429:806: katamāṃ diśāmanugato dhanyā vanagulmadevatā yāsya sakhī||138||
429:807: atiduḥkha mahya chandā nidhidarśiya netrauddhṛtā cakṣudadā|
429:809: tānapi jahitva nirgatu kiṃ punarima istrikāmaratim|
429:812: prāgeva tena bhaṇitaṃ nāsti jarāmaraṇasaṃskṛte kāści sakhā||141||
429:814: buddhitva bodhivirajāṃ punarapi etū ihā puravareṃ asmin||142||
429:826: utthi gopi ayu yāti te priyo||145||
429:879: sādhu gopi ma khu bhūyu rodahī
